Food Waste Challenge: innovation processes to reduce food waste.

goals__remit: FoodWIN is the European Innovation Network. It supports entrepreneurs and innovators from across Europe who tackle food waste. With that knowledge, FoodWIN helps local governments, hospitals, schools and food companies to reduce food waste.
